publications.title: Computer Vision for Automated Damage Detection in Offshore Wind Turbine Inspection
publications.summary: Developed a YOLOv8-based offshore turbine damage detection system with 96.5% F1 on severe defects, projected to save $3.4M over 25 years for a 100-turbine wind farm.

publications.title: Online Budget-Aware Ad Allocation with Dynamic Throttling and Dual-Pricing Policies
publications.summary: Developed adaptive budget-aware algorithms for online ad allocation, narrowing the optimality gap to 4.5% on a 100k-impression dataset.

publications.title: Sparse Optimization for LLM Compression under Data Scarcity: Evidence from DistilGPT-2
publications.summary: Applied L1 (lasso) and group lasso methods to prune DistilGPT2 (82M parameters) using the WikiText-2 dataset, reducing parameter count while maintaining perplexity.

publications.title: Detecting AI-Generated Art through Generative Artifacts: A CNNâ€“ResNet50 Comparison
publications.summary: Built and benchmarked real-vs-AI artwork classifiers using custom CNNs and pretrained vision models (CNNs, ResNet) on a 21k-image dataset, achieving high-accuracy discrimination for art-fraud detection.

publications.title: Deterministic Voice Intelligence System (from Scratch)
publications.summary: Built a deterministic voice intelligence agent using FastAPI, Whisper, Llama 3.3 70B (OpenRouter), LangGraph, and ElevenLabs for end-to-end speech reasoning.

publications.title: Hi-Expense: Financial Management Software
publications.summary: Built a personal financial management system using Python, JavaScript, Chart.js, and PostgreSQL.

publications.title: ShareNote: Online Word Processor
publications.summary: Developed a real-time online word processor using JavaScript, MongoDB, React, Socket.IO, and Quill API.
